desc: project is for ‘Revolution Films’ and their new movie ‘Space War’. Space Warfrom the outset has been a high investment project for Revolution Films as apart from the film itself there are many spin-offs which include a successful cartoon, video games, toy figures and spaceships, and other merchandising.A bit about the film itself – Space War is a £70 million block buster based on the invasion of Earth by an alien race (the Giganti) and its superior technology. The film is set in 2014 and begins with the aliens attacking China, Russia, and rapidly occupying most of Asia before stopping at the edge of Europe. Despite a combined resistance from earth the invasion has been rapid taking just 3 days. The reason the aliens have stopped is to offer the surviving humans a chance to surrender before a second attack would commence. The film ends at this point as there is to be a sequel where earth attempts to repel the invasion.In terms of technology key elements of the invasion force are –•	Xarky Storm Attack craft – spacecraft equivalent to advanced jet fighters being 5 metres in length.•	Coven Command Bases – These are large space battle stations that are used to launch attacks on earth. These measure around 2 miles in length. Housed here are the Xarky Storm Attack craft, battle robots, robot drones and the aliens themselves.Earths defences•	Earth has access to only conventional ships and aircraft carriers, planes, helicopters, and missiles.As a designer you have been asked to create for the above film scenario the following media resources and application –•	You need to create to your own specification a model of a battle robot that could appear in the film.•	You must create an alien spacecraft to your own design that could be used in the invasion of Earth.Price is negotiable.. I also have other requirements will send attachment for selected freelancersSkills: 3D Animation, 3D Modelling, 3D Rendering, Animation, PhotoshopSee more: war specification, war 3d model, video to 3d model, toy 3d model, spacecraft design, space 3d model, set 3d model, missiles 3d model for games, large 3d model, key 3d model, jet 3d model, humans 3d model, design by humans, create your own cartoon design, create your own 3d model, create your 3d model, create a cartoon video, craft 3d model, china 3d model, cartoon scenario, cartoon 3d model animation, animation cartoon application, animation 3d games, alien 3d model, aircraft 3d model
title: 3D Modelling with 3ds max with explanation video

desc: We want some who can take a bland ranch home and be creative in redesigning our current homes exterior with the added editions we want to add on. we have done this before with a local firm and were very unhappy with the 2d designs and ended up paying for designs that were very plain and unappealing. We want someone who has skill in sketchup and 3D design and can create a beautiful stylish home using our ideas. We don't need a floor plan just the exterior design to submit to contractors and the county . I can supply as many photos of the home as needed and give example ideas we would like incorporated into the remodel. We are looking for a more traditional craftsman style home nothing to modern. The house is currently a 45x30 plain jane box with a low 4/12 pitch roof built on a full walkout basement. we are not against changing the roof line if need be but also would like to see if anyone has ideas to incorporate our additions into the roof line as is and still give the home new character but if that is not possible then we would welcome ideas with a new steeper roof pitch. The editions are as follows, a new entry foyer and extended living room on one end of the house and a 16 foot extension to the other end and an attached 2 car garage. We have ideas and drawing of our own but are open to other ideas as well. I have revised this posting twice today to be more precise as to what we are looking for. We really want someone passionate about residential home design and someone who can help us envision our home as we would like to see it. our ultimate goal is to have a workable usable drawing to submit to contractors for bid yet this winter so we can begin work in the spring. The reason I requested sketchup experience is because I have that program on my computer and would like to import the finished design onto my laptop to play with the color schemes, roofing and siding options and roofing materials to see what looks best if that is possible.
title: Do some 3D Modelling
